channel.description: Recent content in Posts on x3ero0's blog

item.title: Year3000
item.description: Year3000 [RE - Nullcon Hackim2020 CTF] One day when I came home at lunchtime I heard a funny noise Went out to the back yard to find out If it was one of those rowdy boys Stood there was my neighbor called Peter And a flux capacitor I guess there must be quite some entropy in a flux capacitor… nc re.ctf.nullcon.net 1234 we were given 3000 stripped ELF binaries some 64bit binaries and 32bit binaries.

item.title: Obfuscation_Techniques
item.description: Recently I was watching GynvaelEN’s Old Stream about ELF Packers, and I thought why not make a PE Packer. I decided that I will write a python script to Parse PE Headers from scratch, I was able to parse some headers and then I got stuck and decided that I will use PEFILE. ──────▄▌▐▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀​▀▀▀▀▀▀▌ ───▄▄██▌█ BEEP BEEP ▄▄▄▌▐██▌█ POOR SCRIPT AHEAD ███████▌█▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▄▌ ▀(@)▀▀▀▀▀▀▀(@)(@)▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀(@)▀ so I made a poor packer which is available here packer.
